verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Moreover <S%H559><s%>, thou shalt say to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Whosoever <S%H376><s%> he be of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, or of the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that giveth <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H2233><s%> unto Molech <S%H4432><s%>; he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H7275><s%>.

I also will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%>, and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>; because he hath given <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H2233><s%> unto Molech <S%H4432><s%>, to defile <S%H2930><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, and to profane <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>.

And if the people <S%H5971><s%> at the land <S%H776><s%> do at all <S%H5956><s%> hide <S%H5956><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from that man <S%H376><s%>, when he giveth <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H2233><s%> unto Molech <S%H4432><s%>, and put him not <S%H1115><s%> to death <S%H4191><s%>;

then I will set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%>, and against his family <S%H4940><s%>, and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%>, and all that play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H2181><s%>, to play the harlot with Molech <S%H4432><s%>, from among <S%H7130><s%> their people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the soul <S%H5315><s%> that turneth <S%H6437><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them that have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, and unto <S%H310><s%> the wizards <S%H3049><s%>, to play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>, I will even set my face <S%H6440><s%> against that soul <S%H5315><s%>, and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves therefore <S%H6918><s%>, and be ye holy; for I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
And ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah who sanctifieth you <S%H6942><s%>.

For every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> that curseth <S%H7043><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: he hath cursed <S%H7043><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%>; his blood shall be upon him <S%H1818><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> that committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%> with another man <S%H376><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, even he that committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, the adulterer <S%H5003><s%> and the adulteress <S%H5003><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> that lieth <S%H7901><s%> with his father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>; their blood shall be upon them <S%H1818><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law, both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: they have wrought <S%H6213><s%> confusion <S%H8397><s%>; their blood shall be upon them <S%H1818><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with mankind <S%H2145><s%>, as with <S%H4904><s%> womankind <S%H802><s%>, both <S%H8147><s%> of them have committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%>: they shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>; their blood shall be upon them <S%H1818><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> and her mother <S%H517><s%>, it is wickedness <S%H2154><s%>: they shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, both he and they <S%H2154><s%>; that there be no wickedness among you <S%H8432><s%>.
And if a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H5414><s%> with a beast <S%H929><s%>, he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: and ye shall slay <S%H2026><s%> the beast <S%H929><s%>.

And if a woman <S%H802><s%> approach <S%H7126><s%> unto any beast <S%H929><s%>, and lie down <S%H7250><s%> thereto <S%H2026><s%>, thou shalt kill the woman <S%H802><s%>, and the beast <S%H929><s%>: they shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>; their blood shall be upon them <S%H1818><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>, his father <S%H1><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, or <S%H176><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>, and she see <S%H7200><s%> his nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; it is a shameful thing <S%H2617><s%>; and they shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the children of their people <S%H5971><s%>: he hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> having her sickness <S%H1739><s%>, and shall uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; he hath made naked <S%H6168><s%> her fountain <S%H4726><s%>, and she hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of her blood <S%H1818><s%>: and both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their people <S%H5971><s%>.

And thou shalt not uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>, nor of thy father <S%H1><s%>'s sister <S%H269><s%>; for he hath made naked <S%H6168><s%> his near kin <S%H7607><s%>: they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with his uncle <S%H1733><s%>'s wife, he hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his uncle <S%H1730><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their sin <S%H2399><s%>; they shall die <S%H4191><s%> childless <S%H6185><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, it is impurity <S%H5079><s%>: he hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>'s nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; they shall be childless <S%H6185><s%>.

Ye shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> all my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and all mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H776><s%>; that the land, whither I bring <S%H935><s%> you to dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H6958><s%>, vomit you not out.

And ye shall not walk <S%H3212><s%> in the customs <S%H2708><s%> of the nation <S%H1471><s%>, which I cast out <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>: for they did all these things <S%H6973><s%>, and therefore I abhorred them.

But I have said <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H3423><s%>, Ye shall inherit their land <S%H127><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it unto you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H776><s%>, a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, who hath separated <S%H914><s%> you from the peoples <S%H5971><s%>.

Ye shall therefore make a distinction <S%H914><s%> between the clean <S%H2889><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> and the unclean <S%H2931><s%>, and between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>: and ye shall not make your souls <S%H5315><s%> abominable <S%H8262><s%> by beast <S%H929><s%>, or by bird <S%H5775><s%>, or by anything wherewith <S%H7430><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> teemeth <S%H914><s%>, which I have separated from you as unclean <S%H2930><s%>.
And ye shall be holy <S%H6918><s%> unto me <S%H3068><s%>: for I, Jehovah, am holy <S%H6918><s%>, and have set <S%H914><s%> you apart from the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, that ye should be mine.

A man <S%H376><s%> also or a woman <S%H802><s%> that hath <S%H3588><s%> a familiar spirit <S%H178><s%>, or that is a wizard <S%H3049><s%>, shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: they shall stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones <S%H7275><s%>; their blood shall be upon them <S%H1818><s%>.
